actions.description: List of actions that can be performed on the ServerArray

tags.description: List of tags associated with the ServerArray

state.description: Whether the ServerArray is enabled or disabled

next_instance.description:
The instance (next instance) of a ServerArray is a configuration
            object that describes future instances that come from the
            ServerArray

total_count.description: Total number of active instances in the ServerArray

healthy_count.description: Total number of healthy instances in the ServerArray

unhealthy_count.description: Total number of unhealthy instances in the ServerArray

not_terminated_count.description: Total number of non-terminated instances in the ServerArray

account.description: Link to the Account where the ServerArray exists

cloud.description: Link to the Cloud where the ServerArray exists

next_instance.description: Link to the next Instance of the ServerArray

current_instances.description: Link to the current Instance of the ServerArray
